thread.title: WATCH: The moment a BMW M6 demolishes a wall in Joburg
thread.title_full: WATCH: The moment a BMW M6 demolishes a wall in Joburg

title: WATCH: The moment a BMW M6 demolishes a wall in Joburg
text:
Print The cheapest option for a new BMW M6, the coupe, costs R1,874,568. There are cheaper ways to get rid of a wall. 
This CCTV footage from a security complex in Johannesburg shows a BMW M6 driver losing control when turning a sharp bend, narrowly missing a VW Polo Vivo, only to slam into the complex's wall. Share Tweet SHARE YOUR OPINION If you have an opinion you would like to share on this article, please to the Times LIVE iLIVE team. In the mean time, click here to view the Times LIVE iLIVE section.
